oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Metro Metronome award presented to Johnny Cash by Nashville Mayor Beverly Briley, 1969 November 20
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured from left to right: Nashville Mayor Beverly Briley posing with country singer Johnny Cash, who was presented the “Metronome” award on November 20th, 1969, “for the outstanding contribution to the development of Music City, USA.” Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cash, Johnny; Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
